data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,897 believers in Cantal to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Over 37.62 percent of the people of Cantal are far from Jesus.
Father, may the churches in Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, move the 1,897 believers in the county of Cantal to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the county of Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France has a population of 154,400.

We estimate Cantal has 1,897 people who might know Jesus, 94,419 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 58,084 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Cantal, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes, France to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
